A lightweight and highly maneuverable submachine gun designed for rapid deployment and personal defense. Its compact frame, high rate of fire, and ease of control make it an excellent choice for law enforcement and special forces. Capable of mounting suppressors and optics, it provides adaptability for various tactical scenarios.
